trans-unit.source: Create a database account - Free Trial | Microsoft Azure
trans-unit.target: Create a database account - Free Trial | Microsoft Azure

trans-unit.source: Learn how to create database accounts using the online service portal for Azure DocumentDB, a managed NoSQL document database for JSON.
trans-unit.target: Learn how to create database accounts using the online service portal for Azure DocumentDB, a managed NoSQL document database for JSON.

trans-unit.source: Get a free trial today.
trans-unit.target: Get a free trial today.

trans-unit.source: Create a DocumentDB database account using the Azure preview portal
trans-unit.target: Create a DocumentDB database account using the Azure preview portal

trans-unit.source: To use Microsoft Azure DocumentDB, you must create a DocumentDB database account by using the Azure preview portal.
trans-unit.target: To use Microsoft Azure DocumentDB, you must create a DocumentDB database account by using the Azure preview portal.

trans-unit.source: Are you new to DocumentDB?
trans-unit.target: Are you new to DocumentDB?

trans-unit.source: Watch [this](http://azure.microsoft.com/documentation/videos/create-documentdb-on-azure/) four minute video by Scott Hanselman to see how to complete the most common tasks in the online portal.
trans-unit.target: Watch [this](http://azure.microsoft.com/documentation/videos/create-documentdb-on-azure/) four minute video by Scott Hanselman to see how to complete the most common tasks in the online portal.

trans-unit.source: Next steps
trans-unit.target: Next steps

trans-unit.source: Now that you have a DocumentDB account, the next step is to create a DocumentDB database.
trans-unit.target: Now that you have a DocumentDB account, the next step is to create a DocumentDB database.

trans-unit.source: You can create a database by using one of the following:
trans-unit.target: You can create a database by using one of the following:

trans-unit.source: The C# .NET samples in the [DatabaseManagement](https://github.com/Azure/azure-documentdb-net/tree/master/samples/code-samples/DatabaseManagement) project of the [azure-documentdb-net](https://github.com/Azure/azure-documentdb-net/tree/master/samples/code-samples) repository on GitHub.
trans-unit.target: The C# .NET samples in the [DatabaseManagement](https://github.com/Azure/azure-documentdb-net/tree/master/samples/code-samples/DatabaseManagement) project of the [azure-documentdb-net](https://github.com/Azure/azure-documentdb-net/tree/master/samples/code-samples) repository on GitHub.

trans-unit.source: The preview portal, as described in [Create a DocumentDB database using the Azure preview portal](documentdb-create-database.md).
trans-unit.target: The preview portal, as described in [Create a DocumentDB database using the Azure preview portal](documentdb-create-database.md).

trans-unit.source: The all-inclusive tutorials: [.NET](documentdb-get-started.md), [.NET MVC](documentdb-dotnet-application.md), [Java](documentdb-java-application.md), [Node.js](documentdb-nodejs-application.md), or [Python](documentdb-python-application.md).
trans-unit.target: The all-inclusive tutorials: [.NET](documentdb-get-started.md), [.NET MVC](documentdb-dotnet-application.md), [Java](documentdb-java-application.md), [Node.js](documentdb-nodejs-application.md), or [Python](documentdb-python-application.md).

trans-unit.source: The [DocumentDB SDKs](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/azure/dn781482.aspx).
trans-unit.target: The [DocumentDB SDKs](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/azure/dn781482.aspx).

trans-unit.source: DocumentDB has .NET, Java, Python, Node.js, and JavaScript API SDKs.
trans-unit.target: DocumentDB has .NET, Java, Python, Node.js, and JavaScript API SDKs.

trans-unit.source: After creating your database, you need to [add one or more collections](documentdb-create-collection.md) to the database, then [add documents](documentdb-view-json-document-explorer.md) to the collections.
trans-unit.target: After creating your database, you need to [add one or more collections](documentdb-create-collection.md) to the database, then [add documents](documentdb-view-json-document-explorer.md) to the collections.

trans-unit.source: After you have documents in a collection, you can use [DocumentDB SQL](documentdb-sql-query.md) to [execute queries](documentdb-sql-query.md#executing-queries) against your documents by using the [Query Explorer](documentdb-query-collections-query-explorer.md) in the preview portal, the [REST API](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/azure/dn781481.aspx), or one of the [SDKs](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/azure/dn781482.aspx).
trans-unit.target: After you have documents in a collection, you can use [DocumentDB SQL](documentdb-sql-query.md) to [execute queries](documentdb-sql-query.md#executing-queries) against your documents by using the [Query Explorer](documentdb-query-collections-query-explorer.md) in the preview portal, the [REST API](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/azure/dn781481.aspx), or one of the [SDKs](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/azure/dn781482.aspx).

trans-unit.source: To learn more about DocumentDB, explore these resources:
trans-unit.target: To learn more about DocumentDB, explore these resources:

trans-unit.target: Learning map for DocumentDB

trans-unit.target: DocumentDB resource model and concepts
